quote: Sometimes you can lock the doors and close the blinds, but the monsters are still there inside your house, sleeping and breathing and just waiting to wake up and terrorize you all over again.
quote_letters: SOMETIMES YOU CAN LOCK THE DOORS AND CLOSE THE BLINDS BUT THE MONSTERS ARE STILL THERE INSIDE YOUR HOUSE SLEEPING AND BREATHING AND JUST WAITING TO WAKE UP AND TERRORIZE YOU ALL OVER AGAIN
